properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 8:40AM MST until January 15 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches.

* WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan
Lake, Marias Pass, and Polebridge.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will
significantly reduce visibility at times between Essex and
Marias Pass on US Highway 2.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
